name: Suraphol Sombatcharoen
description: '''Suraphol Sombatcharoen''' (25 September 1930 – 16 August 1968) ([[Thai alphabet|Thai]]: สุรพล สมบัติเจริญ) was a Thai [[luk thung]] singer and former [[Royal Thai Air Force|Air force officer]]. Dubbed the "King of Luk Thung", he was one of the first and most important stars of the genre. He was fatally [[gunshot|shot]] while seated in his own car after a live performance in [[Nakhon Pathom]].
